casebody.data:
People ex rel. Isabella Good v. Wayne Circuit Judge. Notice of trial of Probate Appeals. Hoyt Post for the motion.

Probate appeals require no separate notice of trial for the first term after they are taken, but only at subsequent terms. The notice given with the appeal is sufficient for the first term. — Per Curiam.*

Motion for order to show' cause.

Submitted and denied June 11.
